string.value: #b#p2081400##k said she'll tell me the first truth and told me to come talk to her again when I'm ready.
#b#p2081400##k told me about Jakum, which is the first truth. She said she still has two more stories to tell me.
The first story is about the town vanished into lava volcano. Would you like to listen?
Good. You have the right to listen to the story. Talk to me when you're ready.
Are you afraid? You came this far. Don't be discouraged.
Have you ever been to the deep lava volcano in the El Nath mountains? There used to be a town there.

People in the town worshipped a human shaped stone statue and the volcano. They built an altar and stone statue under the tree at the basin of the deepest volcano and worshiped the altar to prove their faith.
Then disaster struck. It was the wicked Zakum's tree. Zakum's spirit didn't have a body but instead possesed the stone statue that people built. His evil rapidly spread through the town...

After that, the town disappeared. You've heard about the fearsome power called #bZakum#k sleeping under the lava volcano, as you've traveled the Maple World for a long time. Now you know how he came to be. You can guess what happened to the townspeople..
That's the end of the first story. Talk to me when you're ready to listen to the second story.
